mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gazzam, William Audley
mdRecord.dcterms:description: FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] or Genl Oakes Wheeling Aug 18 1861. By Telegraph from Pittsburgh 18 1861. Will you accept a full regt of Pittsburgh Home guards to serve for six months this is the longest period of enlistment that can be promised at present answer immediately. AW Gazzam 30G.75pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Gazzam, William Audley
Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.; Oakes, James
